title: About
body:
AI Sharing Platform is a centralized resource for practitioners, scientists and leaders to explore AI solutions, collaborate and develop as a community and grow an AI-ready government workforce.

# AI Use Case Library

Through sharing the story of an AI project at both  intra-organizational and inter-agency levels, government teams can learn about successful ways to approach business challenges with AI. 

# AI In Government Body of Knowledge

The guide is for agency senior leaders and decision makers. Users could be non-technical decision makers who must determine the level of investment required, and where and how those investments will be deployed.

# AI Community of Practice

Through sharing the story of an AI project at both  intra-organizational and inter-agency levels, government teams can learn about successful ways to approach business challenges with AI.

# AI Learning Path

Investing time and money in a platform that will target the educational needs of the government  workforce will drive their ability to start applying new skills and become educated members of an AI team
name: about
excerpt: How are we going to get an excerpt out of this thing?
